name: Lynx
0:
”Alexa, ask Lynx to teach me yoga.”
”Alexa, tell Lynx to take a picture.”
”Alexa, tell Lynx to move forward.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lynx
des:
Lynx is a skill designed for a humanoid robot called Lynx. In order to fully enjoy the skill, you need to set up a Lynx robot using the Lynx app and link the same Amazon account in the Alexa app. 

Here are the things that Lynx can do for you: 

Teaching you Yoga and workout exercises. For each Yoga pose, Lynx will show you the pose and at the same time explain to you how to do the pose. 
Moving forward, backward, leftward, and rightward as well as turning left and right. 
Dancing for you. Lynx will play music and dance for you at the same time. 
Taking pictures for you. 

You can ask questions or give commands, such as: 

“Alexa, ask Lynx to dance.”
“Alexa, tell Lynx to take a picture.”
“Alexa, tell Lynx to move forward.”
“Alexa, ask Lynx to turn left” 
“Alexa, ask Lynx to teach me yoga.”
“Alexa, tell Lynx to teach me workout exercises.”

Please note: 
Make sure your Lynx is put on a flat surface when using these functions in case that the robot falls down.
